Package com.tagtraum.ffsampledsp

Class FFAudioFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.sound.sampled.spi.AudioFileReader
      • com.tagtraum.ffsampledsp.FFAudioFileReader

  • public class FFAudioFileReader
extends javax.sound.sampled.spi.AudioFileReader
    Open URLs/files or streams and returns a AudioFileFormat instance.
    Author:
    Hendrik Schreiber

      • getAudioFileFormats

        public javax.sound.sampled.AudioFileFormat[] getAudioFileFormats​(java.io.File file)
                                                          throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                                 java.io.IOException
        Returns one or more AudioFileFormats for the given file. Multiple objects are returned, if the file contains multiple streams, e.g. for STEM files.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        Returns:
        one or more AudioFileFormats for the given URL
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio is not supported
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs
        See Also:
        www.stems-music.com, getAudioFileFormat(File)

      • getAudioFileFormats

        public javax.sound.sampled.AudioFileFormat[] getAudioFileFormats​(java.net.URL url)
                                                          throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                                 java.io.IOException
        Returns one or more AudioFileFormats for the given file. Multiple objects are returned, if the file contains multiple streams, e.g. for Stem files.
        Parameters:
        url - url
        Returns:
        one or more AudioFileFormats for the given URL
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio is not supported
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs
        See Also:
        www.stems-music.com, getAudioFileFormat(URL)

      • getAudioInputStream

        public javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getAudioInputStream​(java.io.InputStream stream,
                                                                int streamIndex)
                                                         throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                                java.io.IOException
        Allows you to open a specific audio stream from the given stream. Useful for Stems.
        Parameters:
        stream - stream
        streamIndex - audio stream index
        Returns:
        audio stream
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio is not supported
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is not valid.
        See Also:
        getAudioInputStream(URL), getAudioInputStream(File, int)

      • getAudioInputStream

        public javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getAudioInputStream​(java.net.URL url,
                                                                int streamIndex)

                                                                java.io.IOException
        Allows you to open a specific audio stream from the given URL. Useful for Stems.
        Parameters:
        url - url
        streamIndex - audio stream index
        Returns:
        audio stream
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio is not supported
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is not valid.
        See Also:
        getAudioInputStream(URL), getAudioInputStream(File, int)

        Parameters:

        streamIndex - audio stream index
        Returns:
        audio stream
        Throws:

        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is not valid.
